import{addToCart,removeFromCart}from"../redux/actions/cartActions";var CartScreen=function CartScreen(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var cart=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart;});var cartItems=cart.cartItems;useEffect(function(){},[]);var qtyChangeHandler=function qtyChangeHandler(id,qty){dispatch(addToCart(id,qty));};// Removing selected item from the cart
